Package slogo.model

Interface slogo.Turtle

public interface slogo.Turtle
The slogo.Turtle Interface is an API that provides publically accessable methods.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int move​(int x, int y)
    The move method changes the turtles position by x in the x direction and y in y direction.
    void togglePen()
    The method toggles the value of the pen to be either up or down.
    void toggleVisibility()
    The method toggles the booleann visible to be either visible or not.
    int turn​(int degrees)
    The turn method turns the turtle a degrees amount.

  • Method Details

    • move

      int move​(int x, int y) throws java.lang.Exception
      The move method changes the turtles position by x in the x direction and y in y direction. It throws an excpetion if the move puts the turle out of bounds It returns how much it has moved.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • turn

      int turn​(int degrees)
      The turn method turns the turtle a degrees amount. It returns the amount moved.

    • togglePen

      void togglePen()
      The method toggles the value of the pen to be either up or down.

    • toggleVisibility

      void toggleVisibility()
      The method toggles the booleann visible to be either visible or not.
